text:
Alden Caleb Ehrenreich (; born November 22, 1989) is an American actor.
In 2013, he appeared in Woody Allen's "Blue Jasmine" and Park Chan-wook's "Stoker." In 2016, Ehrenreich starred as Hobie Doyle in the Coen brothers comedy "Hail, Caesar!" and for his leading role in Warren Beatty's romantic comedy-drama "Rules Don't Apply".
He played Han Solo in 2018's '.
